name: breadcrumb
description: Follow breadcrumbs to a piece of cake

scripts.build: jshint . && browserify -s breadcrumb -do dist/breadcrumb.js breadcrumb.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/breadcrumb.min.js dist/breadcrumb.js
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
